# init(peerToken:)

**Initializer**

Creates a configuration for interaction between devices, including iPhone and Apple Watch.

## Declaration

```swift
init(peerToken: NIDiscoveryToken)
```

## Parameters

- **peerToken**: The value of another device’s discovery token. This value uniquely identifies the other peer in the interaction session.

## Discussion

To acquire a peer’s discovery token, two instantiations of the app exchange their respective [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NISession/discoveryToken] over the network using a method you choose. For a discussion that covers sharing discovery tokens using [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/MultipeerConnectivity], see [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/discovering-peers-with-multipeer-connectivity].
